Title: Provides for a New York power authority trustee from Niagara county
Summary: Provides that the next appointed trustee of the power authority of New York state shall be from Niagara county and provides for a permanent trustee from such county on such authority.
LawCode: Amd ยง1003, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the trustees of the power authority of New York state
